summary: Completed comprehensive testing of ReEntry Connect MN application. Backend APIs are working well (93% success rate) with all core functionality operational. Frontend is fully functional with excellent navigation, search, filtering, and chatbot integration.

minor_bugs.issue: Chat requests timeout after 10 seconds due to AI processing time
minor_bugs.impact: Users may experience delays in chatbot responses
minor_bugs.workaround: Increase timeout or add loading indicators

minor_bugs.issue: Returns HTTP 200 instead of 201 for resource creation
minor_bugs.impact: Minor HTTP status code inconsistency, functionality works correctly

ui_bugs.issue: Map view may not load consistently when modal overlay is present
ui_bugs.workaround: Close modal first, then switch to map view

passed_tests: Home page loads with hero section and stats (17+ resources)
Navigation between Home, Resources, and About pages works perfectly
Resources page displays all 16 seeded resources correctly
Category filter buttons work for all 7 categories (Housing, Legal Aid, Employment, Healthcare, Education, Food, Transportation)
Search functionality filters resources by name, description, and services
Resource detail sheets open with complete contact information
Chatbot opens, accepts messages, and integrates with OpenAI GPT-5.2
All navbar navigation links function correctly
Category navigation from home page applies filters properly
Backend API endpoints return correct data and status codes
Database seeding works with 16 resources across 7 categories
Resource filtering by category returns accurate results
Search functionality works across multiple fields
Individual resource retrieval by ID works correctly
